snippet.title: Ruby Rose Ace Attorney - Case 2 ~ PLAYABLE
snippet.description:
It's here! Ruby Rose Ace Attorney Case 2: Turnabout Betrayal is now officially playable! Follow the link below to play the game!

http://aceattorney.sparklin.org/V6_Test/player.html?trial_id=66816

If there's any bugs you find, let me know so I can fix it for everyone. You may need to use Firefox or Google Chrome, apparently Internet explorer doesn't work very well with the game.

FAQ and Guide - https://www.dropbox.com/s/s8yzkeijly4pss5/Ruby%20Rose%20Ace%20Attorney%20Case%202%20FAQ.txt?dl=0

______________________________

Ruby Rose Ace Attorney Case 2 - Turnabout Betrayal

A month after her first case, Ruby Rose finds herself rather bored at the office. She doesn't seem to be getting many exciting cases. She's handed a folder containing an old case, one that put her two friends Blake Belladona and Weiss Schnee against each other.

-----------
Ruby Rose Ace Attorney is a crossover between the Ace Attorney video game series and the RWBY webseries. RWBY characters have been adapted to fit into the world of Phoenix Wright Ace Attorney. Some characters may have been modified in the crossover. Players will play as Ruby Rose, a newbie defense attorney and defend her clients.

For those that don't know how to play Ace Attorney games, it's essentially like a visual novel. You keep progressing through dialogue until you reach a point where you must contradict witness testimony using evidence. You will point out something they are lying about. That's pretty much the formula for how you play.

For more Ruby Rose Ace Attorney GO HERE - https://www.youtube.com/playlist?list=PLM9lVP5_rVu27Qj5eUKHeLh6e_iizvGSJ

Or visit my deviantart for more updates -http://iceninjax77.deviantart.com/
